cause.description:
Through constant revolution, we will create a classless society! Throw off the yoke of the oppressors!
1. The bourgeoisie are oppressing us.
2. We gotta violently revolt against them...
3. Until we get a perfect, happy, shiny society with no class system and no corruption!
4. Remember the October Revolution!
cause.name: Proletariats of the World, Unite!
